name: Action Fills
description:
Worked on a AR game for the first time. Hope you guys like it.

=======INSTRUCTIONS ========

Give camera access to your phone.

Works only on android phones.

=======GAMEPLAY========

Once you click play, Keep your phone showing on the ground to detect AR terrains.

Click on the correct option displayed which matches the question/phrase on below and earn points.

The character will animate when you click on the action buttons. If you click on correct answer you will get points , if you click on wrong answer your attempts will be reduced by 1.
